TopicTitle: Universal Tug and Docking Port Adapter

Articles.Content:
I know this isn't the fanciest craft ever posted here but I got really sick and tired of not having the port I needed. The RCS jets look like they were put on by a 3 year old, but trust me they are perfectly balanced for translation prior to taking on a load. Enjoy.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Version 1 - Probe reaction wheel only

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/9097777/Universal%20Tug.craft

Version 2 - Added ASAS

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/9097777/Universal%20Tug%20v2.craft
